page.title: 06Ferrybridge Power Station
page.content: Sometimes at night,whoosh,the power station lets off steam.It makes you lie awake for ages.When you look out- side you can see traffic but you can't hear it because of the noise.At night when I look out of my window I can see all the red lights on the power stat- ion chimneys They are to warn aircraft that there are cooling towers and tall chimneys about.Steam comes out of the cooling towers like balls of cotton wool.When the suns shines,it changes colour,grey,yellow,pink or just plain white.Smoke and chemicals come out of the chimneys. The power station people check the rainfall over Ferrybridge to see if it is polluted.They have a rain collector in our school grounds.Most of the chemicals blow to Sweden and turn to acid rain.People complain when ash floats down and makes a mess of their cars and houses.It looks awful.
